problem: 如图,AB为⊙O的直径,CD是弦,AB⊥CD于E,若AB=10,OE=3,则弦CD的长为()
answer: 【解答】解:连接OC,∵直径AB=10,∴OC=5,∵AB⊥CD,∴E为CD的中点,即CE=DE=\frac{1}{2}CD,在Rt△OCE中,OC=5,OE=3,根据勾股定理得:CE=√{OC²-OE²}=4,则CD=2CE=8．
comment: 此题考查了垂径定理,以及勾股定理,熟练掌握定理是解本题的关键．
problem_en: As shown in the figure, AB is the diameter of ⊙O, CD is the chord, AB ⊥ CD at E, if AB = N_0, OE = N_1, then the length of the chord CD is ()
